name: Touch And Run
description:
This is the first game I made for the "Game A Week" challenge!

The player has to touch the blue triangles to score points and avoid the red ones, which, instead, remove points. The more points the player gets, the faster the game will be.

Brief analysis of the game:

Idea: After I watched the video of MsMinotaur about her "Game a Week" challenge I played her first game and then I came up with this idea. Basically, the player needs to score points by hitting light blue triangles and avoid the red ones, which, instead, decrease the score.

What went well: Basically the fact that I was able to come up with an idea, that I really like it and that I was able to make it in a game in just two days. Also, I really like how I "juiced" it.

What went wrong: I spent too much time in juice it and not enough exploring its potential. Then, there was a lot of other stuff that I wanted to implement but I didn't have time.

What I learned: Ironically, I learned the same thing that MsMinotaur learned. The project needs to start early in the week in order to have enough time to experiment with the game idea.
